files.description: Defines the canonical runtime/outputs scaffold, its purpose, directory conventions, and the single-source-of-truth artifacts maintained there.
Tracks versioned changes to runtime/outputs artifacts (templates, taxonomy, schemas, and examples) to preserve provenance and auditability.
Provides the canonical preregistration template used across the project as the authoritative source for prereg deliverables.
Stores the canonical taxonomy definition in JSON to standardize labels and structure used by agent-created deliverables.
Defines the JSON Schema for validating the canonical taxonomy JSON to ensure consistent structure and required fields.
Provides a concrete example annotation instance demonstrating correct use of the taxonomy and serving as a reference for producers/consumers.

missionDescription: Promote/consolidate agent-created deliverables into a canonical runtime/outputs scaffold: create runtime/outputs/README.md and runtime/outputs/CHANGELOG.md, and copy in the prereg template + taxonomy JSON/schema/example annotation so the project has a single source of truth.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
Current artifacts appear in agent-specific directories; without a canonical /outputs structure and changelog, work cannot be reliably reused or cited.
projectName: runtime/outputs/README.md and runtime/outputs/CHANGELOG.md, and copy in the prereg template + taxonomy JSON/schema/example annotation so the project has a single source of truth.
